Jorge Lorenzo Butuh 1,5 Bulan Tanpa Balapan demi Pulih Total
06 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Repsol Honda, Jorge Lorenzo, tak malu-malu mengakui bahwa MotoGP 2019 merupakan musim terberatnya selama berkarier di ajang Grand Prix. Bagaimana tidak? Selain hanya bertarung di papan bawah, ia sulit beradaptasi dengan RC213V, dan juga dirundung berbagai cedera sepanjang musim.
Dalam sesi presentasi Honda di EICMA, Milan, Italia, Selasa (5/11/2019), Lorenzo menyatakan bahwa menerima kenyataan dirinya tak bisa menang adalah 'tugas' yang sulit. Tak heran, karena ia merupakan lima kali juara dunia, dan nyaris setiap tahun memperebutkan gelar dunia.
"Tahun ini sulit bagi rider seperti saya, yang biasa berkendara di level terbaik MotoGP dan merebut kemenangan. Pada musim perdana di Honda, saya tak pernah 100% fit. Dimulai dari retak scaphoid, kecelakaan di Qatar, dan cedera di Assen, yakni cedera terberat dalam karier saya," ujarnya seperti yang dikutip Speedweek.

Jorge Lorenzo Needs 1.5 Months Without Racing for Total Recovery
Nov 6 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Soccer - Repsol Honda rider, Jorge Lorenzo, is not shy about admitting that MotoGP 2019 is the toughest season for a career in the Grand Prix. How come? In addition to only fighting on the bottom board, he had difficulty adapting to RC213V, and was also plagued by various injuries throughout the season.
In a Honda presentation session at EICMA, Milan, Italy, Tuesday (11/05/2019), Lorenzo stated that accepting the fact that he could not win was a difficult task. No wonder, because he is a five-time world champion, and almost every year fighting over the world title.
"This year it was difficult for riders like me, who used to drive at the best level in MotoGP and win. In the inaugural season at Honda, I was never 100% fit. Starting from a scaphoid crack, an accident in Qatar, and an injury in Assen, the heaviest injury in my career, "he said as quoted by Speedweek.
